results.title: Atenolol's Inferior Ability to Reduce Central vs Peripheral Blood Pressure Can Be Explained by the Combination of Its Heart Rate-Dependent and Heart Rate-Independent Effects
results.text_hl: We studied the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ on SBPA at different HR levels in a model of @<m>DISEASE_Sick_Sinus_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012804 @@@sick sinus syndrome@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a permanent cardiac pacemaker in an acute setting.

citations.NLM: Teeäär T, Serg M, Paapstel K, Vähi M, Kals J, Cockcroft JR, Zilmer M, Eha J, Kampus P. Atenolol's Inferior Ability to Reduce Central vs Peripheral Blood Pressure Can Be Explained by the Combination of Its Heart Rate-Dependent and Heart Rate-Independent Effects Int J Hypertens. 2020;2020():4259187. PMID: 32395337

results.title: Comparative study of the antihypertensive effect of verapamil and atenolol.
results.text_hl: A moderate decrease in heart rate was obtained. @<m>DISEASE_Sick_Sinus_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012804 @@@Sinus bradycardia@@@ was observed in 3 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ and 4 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: Acute symptomatic sinus bradycardia in a woman treated with pulse dose steroids for multiple sclerosis: a case report
results.text_hl: Her usual resting heart ranged from 100 to 120bpm prior to starting @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and 80 to 100bpm after starting @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Kundu A, Fitzgibbons TP. Acute symptomatic sinus bradycardia in a woman treated with pulse dose steroids for multiple sclerosis: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2015 Sep 24;9():216. PMID: 26400725

results.title: Effects of the association of dual-site dynamic atrial overdrive and atenolol in preventing recurrent atrial fibrillation.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Twenty-five @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with recurrent episodes of paroxysmal @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Sick_Sinus_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012804 @@@sinus node disease@@@ had dual-site atrial and ventricular pacemakers implanted, and were started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, 100 mg/day.

citations.NLM: Menezes Ada S Jr, Martinelli Filho M, Menezes CC, Costa R, Ramires JA. Effects of the association of dual-site dynamic atrial overdrive and atenolol in preventing recurrent atrial fibrillation. Arq Bras Cardiol. 2007 Jan;88(1):1-7. PMID: 17364111

results.title: Combined therapy with Ca-antagonists and beta-adrenergic receptor blocking agents in chronic stable angina.
results.text_hl: Only one @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ developed @<m>DISEASE_Sick_Sinus_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012804 @@@sinus bradycardia@@@ when on combined therapy (48 bpm).
